title: Tesla to recall 817,143 vehicles because audible chime may not activate if driver's seat belt is not fastened
text: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Thursday that Tesla Inc. TSLA, -2.75% is recalling 817,143 vehicles because the audible chime may not activate if the driver's seat belt is not fastened. "As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard number 208, "Occupant Crash Protection", the agency said in a statement.
